fullplot: A girl, whose mother dies of sorrow from her husband's family's rejection, grows up singing and dancing like her mother. She works as a dancing girl and is courted by a prince, but can think only of a man she has never met, who left her a message on the train. She dreams of him and cannot dance, becomes frightened and runs into the night
plot: The story of a prostitute, with a pure heart (PAKEEZAH), and grand dreams...
title: Pakeezah
